sense.def:
Osebo ali predmet, ki je
among a group of people or things
, obkroža skupina ljudi ali predmetov.

seg.quote: We stood there among piles of wooden boxes.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
among a group of people
, je v družbi drugih.

Kadar rečemo, da je neka oseba naredila nekaj
among others
, hočemo povedati, da so tisto storili tudi drugi in ne le ona.

seg.quote: Bluestone, among other union leaders, argued against a strike.

sense.def:
Kadar vlada mnenje ali stanje
among a group of people
, velja za skupino ljudi, ki ga imajo ali ga doživljajo.

seg.quote: He has always been popular among MPs.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj razdeljeno
among three or more people
, vsaka od treh ali več oseb dobi svoj del.
